reviewText:
Great product, my daughter loves it and nows knows the shapes in Arabic!
Thank you Little Thinking Minds
U can actually get these as an app on iPads Andy's much cheaper my sin lives watching this but for what you play it's a very short DVD- wish it was longer and a bit more creative

My toddler loves this. It covers all of the basic 2d shapes, and provide numerous examples of where you will find them in real life. My daughter is learning Arabic as a second language so the simplicity and songs have made it easy to acquire the vocabulary.

i cant believe i bought 3 dvds i should bought one and if it my kids liked then i would bought more wast of money these are very short and poorly made dvds. if there was less than one star i would rated it nothing
I put the DVD in the car'dvd player and in two weeks I realised she news her shapes. that 's was a excellent choise.

This is the best DVD i have ever bought for my little baby girl. She is 11 months and loves watching it every day.. She will be staring at the TV. Great picture, great songs. They actually sing a lot of arabic songs to teach kids the arabic language. I highly recommend it to everyone wants to teach their child the arabic language in a fun way.
